name: SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode
desc: Options for animating each particle with a sequence of images, used by the imageSequenceAnimationMode property.

items.name: case `repeat`
items.desc: The animation loops after displaying all of its images.

items.name: case clamp
items.desc: The animation stops after displaying all of its images.

items.name: case autoReverse
items.desc: After the animation displays all of its images, it plays again in reverse order.
